name.description: full name of the NBA player (e.g., LeBron James).

birth_date.description: birth date of the player; use format YYYY/%-m/%-d (e.g., 1984/2/30).

nationality.description: nationality of the player (e.g., American, France).

age.description: age of the player (if death_date is given, compute as death_date - birth_date; otherwise, compute as 2025/1/1 - birth_date).

team.description: the current NBA team the player belongs to, or the last NBA team the player joined if not currently active (e.g., Los Angeles Lakers).

position.description: player's primary position on the team; choose one from ['Frontcourt', 'Backcourt'].

draft_pick.description: the pick number at which the player was selected in the NBA draft (e.g., 1).

draft_year.description: the year the player was selected in the NBA draft; use format YYYY (e.g., 2003).

college.description: the college the player attended, if applicable (e.g., Duke University).

nba_championships.description: number of NBA championships the player has won (e.g., 4).

mvp_awards.description: number of NBA MVP awards the player has won; use 0 if none (e.g., 2).

olympic_gold_medals.description: number of Olympic gold medals the player has won (e.g., 3).

fiba_world_cup.description: number of FIBA World Cup titles the player has won (e.g., 1).

name.description: name is the full name of the team owner (e.g. Jeanie Buss).

age.description: age is the age of the team owner, a integer (e.g. 45).

nationality.description: nationality is the nationality of the team owner (e.g. American).

nba_team.description: NBA_team is the NBA team's name the owner own, (e.g. Los Angeles Lakers).

own_year.description: own_year is year the owner have this NBA team (e.g. 2010).

team_name.description: team_name is the full name of the team (e.g. Los Angeles Lakers).

founded_year.description: founded_year is the year of this team team founded (e.g. 1947).

location.description: location is the lastest city the team team located (e.g. Los Angeles).

ownership.description: ownership is the name of the team's owner (e.g. Jeanie Buss).

championships.description: championships is the number of this team getting championships (e.g. 5).

city_name.description: city_name is the name of the city (e.g. Boston)

state_name.description: state_name is the name of the state the city is located in (e.g. California).

population.description: population is the population of the city (e.g. 7000000).

area.description: area is the area of the city in square kilometers (e.g. 89.64).

gdp.description: gdp is the gross domestic product of the city in millions (e.g. 7.2).
